description:
Hidaka is a second-year student. People were confused with Hidaka`s sex because Hidaka is seen wearing both the male and female school uniforms. Hidaka is a reporter in ASP (Anti Suppression Paper), which is one of the news clubs at Takafuji Academy. It is later revealed that Hidaka is actually a girl who was forced by her club to wear both male and female school uniforms so as to falsify the number of club members to obtain more funding.
Source: Wiki
name: Shiohama Hidaka
